alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Pope; Stearns; Stevens; Swift; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 8:09PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Douglas, Pope, Stevens, southern Todd, northwestern Stearns and northeastern Swift Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 808 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and a few thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake Hattie to near Starbuck to near Brooten. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong wind gusts will be near... Glenwood, Brooten, Belgrade and Lowry around 815 PM CDT. Alexandria, Sauk Centre and Melrose around 830 PM CDT. Carlos and Lake Osakis around 835 PM CDT. Grey Eagle around 840 PM CDT. Long Prairie and Brandon around 845 PM CDT. Evansville around 850 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Glenwood Airport, Swift Falls, Alberta, Garfield, Villard, Burtrum, Miltona, Holmes City, Lake Minnewaska and Clotho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Douglas; Pope; Stearns; Stevens; Swift; Todd
